seemed to "fix" the problem. I am honestly not sure what it was.

I guess the "This one won't compile," still refers to this code being inside WTP
i.e. not when pasting into a fresh project, right?

I've protected the code against this.

Fixed in HEAD.

file won't even compile on the latest WTP anymore I think because of changes in
dependencies. So even if you checked out all the WTP dependencies, you could
make this file compile.
